TODAY_SUN_EN.text: Vitality is highlighted. Lean into confidence and visibility.

TODAY_MARS_EN.text: Action and drive surge. Channel it constructively.

TODAY_ASC_EN.text: First impressions matter today. Present your best self.

TODAY_MERCURY_EN.text: Focus on clear communication and learning.

TODAY_SATURN_EN.text: Discipline pays. Respect limits and structure.

TODAY_MC_EN.text: Career visibility increases. Align actions with goals.

TODAY_VENUS_EN.text: Harmony, aesthetics, and relationships get a boost.

TODAY_JUPITER_EN.text: Growth and optimism. Think bigger, but stay grounded.

TODAY_NN_EN.text: Destiny nudges you forward. Follow meaningful opportunities.
